recommendations.title: The 75 best experiences in India
recommendations.excerpt: History and mystery, food and drink, music and dance, lions and tigers, beaches and mountains, sun and sand, rain and snow—everything that you ever want to experience, it is right here.

recommendations.title: I was Hypnotized as a Teen. Was it Dangerous?
recommendations.excerpt: Each year, comedy hypnotists bring thousands of willing participants on stage to be hypnotized in front of crowds—harmless fun or risky business?

recommendations.title: Rediscovering India Through One-Of-A-Kind Travel Experiences
recommendations.excerpt: India provides eco-friendly, enriching travel experiences beyond escapism, fostering connections with locals and the environment and preserving cultural and natural heritage.

recommendations.title: The Best Part of Tiny Living? The ‘Freedom We Have Created for Ourselves.’
recommendations.excerpt: With a little house in The Hague, a compact getaway on the Italian island of Sardinia and a well-designed camper van, who needs a conventional home?

recommendations.title: How wastewater could offer an early warning system for measles
recommendations.excerpt: Sewage surveillance has helped us track polio, covid, mpox, and more. Why not measles?

recommendations.title: Who will be the next Liverpool manager? Jurgen Klopp leaving Liverpool
recommendations.excerpt: Thomas Frank? Xabi Alonso? Jose Mourinho? The available names as Liverpool considers its future.

recommendations.title: Two Nations, a Horrible Accident, and the Urgent Need to Understand the Laws of Space Right Now
recommendations.excerpt: Welcome to the world’s foremost training ground for saving space from disasters, disputes, and—perhaps one day—colonizers named Musk.

recommendations.title: How the Rich Keep Their Riches Out of Reach
recommendations.excerpt: Eight ways to hide an asset.

recommendations.title: Workplace “Aporia”: How to Handle Unresolvable Arguments
recommendations.excerpt: There will come a time when you cannot compromise with someone. How can you move forward when conflict is inevitable?

recommendations.title: Can Being Pregnant Change Your DNA?
recommendations.excerpt: You may have seen some videos on social media that have you wondering , can being pregnant change your DNA? An OB explains the real deal with pregnancy and DNA.

recommendations.title: The Potent Pollution Of Noise
recommendations.excerpt: Earth’s acoustic environment has been profoundly altered by noise, but it’s not too late to change course.

recommendations.title: Why Does ‘Hell’s Kitchen’ Still Celebrate Toxic Chef Culture?
recommendations.excerpt: After 22 seasons, Gordon Ramsay’s show remains a safe space for unhinged workplace aggression.

recommendations.title: Can Animals Evolve Fast Enough to Keep Up With Climate Change?
recommendations.excerpt: Some may be able to, while others may not.

recommendations.title: How to Spot a Liar: 10 Essential Tells – From Random Laughter to Copycat Gestures
recommendations.excerpt: The Traitors has shown just how adept some people are at lying. Here, an ex-FBI agent, a psychologist and a fraud investigator share their best tips for detecting dishonesty.

recommendations.title: How to Compost: An Easy DIY Guide
recommendations.excerpt: Here’s how to make a critical ingredient for a stunning garden right at home.

recommendations.title: Here’s how utility-scale solar farms may just help save the bees
recommendations.excerpt: A five-year study of solar farms planted with wildflowers and native grasses found that native bees showed a 20-fold increase in numbers.

recommendations.title: Feeling Stuck? Here Are 5 Ways to Jumpstart Your Life.
recommendations.excerpt: Mental health experts suggest exercises to knock down the internal roadblocks that are causing burnout and holding you back.

recommendations.title: Nintendo’s Switch 2 Conundrum
recommendations.excerpt: With rumors swirling around a new Switch console, Nintendo has a bit of a Goldilocks problem: Change too little, and the console could be met with a shrug. Change too much, and Nintendo could have another Wii U on its hands. The Nintendo consoles of the 21st century are quirky things.

recommendations.title: The Discovery of the Americas’ Long-Lost ‘Rome’
recommendations.excerpt: The unearthing of an immense network of cities deep in the Ecuadorean Amazon is proving that the world's biggest rainforest was once a thriving cosmopolitan hub.

recommendations.title: VIDEO: Eco India: How a few textile makers in Gujarat are course-correcting from 'business as usual’
recommendations.excerpt: Globally, textile production contributes to approximately 20% of water pollution by continuously discharging untreated wastewater into lakes and rivers.

recommendations.title: Milk Seller to Movie Star: Indian Village Boy’s Incredible Story Is Taught In China’s Schools
recommendations.excerpt: How far can you go to pursue your passion? A Bruce Lee fan, Dev Raturi's fascination with martial arts and acting took him from Uttarakhand's Tehri Garhwal to China.

recommendations.title: Everyone Has Relationship Deal-Breakers. Here’s How to Identify Yours
recommendations.excerpt: Plus the best, non-awkward ways to bring them up.

recommendations.title: India's Economic Rise: From GDP growth to surge in equities and consumer spending
recommendations.excerpt: India's story isn't just about surpassing Hong Kong as the fourth-largest stock market. It is about scripting a financial saga beyond market numbers, waltzing to a $5 to $10 trillion GDP.

recommendations.title: Are Eye Creams Really Necessary if You Use Regular Face Lotion?
recommendations.excerpt: Does eye cream work? Learn from dermatologists whether eye cream is necessary or if you can use your regular face moisturizer for under-eye bags and fine lines.

recommendations.title: With a high burden of domestic work, how much time to Indian women spend on self-care?
recommendations.excerpt: Less time for leisure and self-care can affect building community and result in isolation.

recommendations.title: In India an algorithm declares them dead; they have to prove they’re alive
recommendations.excerpt: Haryana state ended old age and widow pensions for thousands of claimants because they were dead. But they weren’t.

recommendations.title: Why Tekken Is the Best Fighting Game Franchise
recommendations.excerpt: It may have not the multimedia reach of Street Fighter or Mortal Kombat, but Tekken is gaming's greatest fighting franchise.

recommendations.title: The New Architecture Wars
recommendations.excerpt: Traditionalist and modernist architecture are both mass-produced, industrial and international. Is there an alternative?

recommendations.title: How to Write the Best CV Depending on Where You Are in Your Career
recommendations.excerpt: Sprucing up your CV is an essential part of the job search.

recommendations.title: Map: European Colonialism Conquered Every Country in the World But These Five
recommendations.excerpt: This map shows every country that's been colonized or conquered by Europe. It’s virtually all of them.
